lines.text: Slick didn't know they weren't Level 2, I bet...
So... wouldn't he want to fire as soon as he showed up?
If he wasted any time, he could be turned to <c=#0000FF>stone,</c> or one of them could <c=#FF0000>escape.</c>
Well, for one thing, that's speculatin' on motive, not hard evidence on what happened.
And for another thing, you're givin' Slick too much credit.
Sure, he didn't know about their level- but he didn't know anything about their magic.
He didn't have any reason t'be afraid of those specific things.
